title: Interesting T206 (two name, double stamp, etc) - taking offers
author: PEEK enterprises

posts.post_title: Interesting T206 (two name, double stamp, etc) - taking offers
posts.post_content:
Taking offers on any of the (3) very difficult and highly sought after T206 misprints.  All cards guaranteed Authentic/Unaltered and all are in outstanding condition as you can see from the scans:

Double Name (Clancy Top / Lennox Bottom) (SOLD)

Payne - Double Factory Stamp (Fact #30 & Fact #42)

Jordan - Top of next card showing on front & back (SOLD)

email - [url]ppgustafson@yahoo.com[/url]

[IMG]http://collectiblesauctionplace.com/t206oddsf.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://collectiblesauctionplace.com/t206oddsb.jpg[/IMG]

Does the Payne measure correctly?
Or is it my rapidly deteriorating eyes?
--C.
